mapper.select:
select count(*) from RESERVATION r
where (REPLACE(r.rsv_title, ' ', '') like CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{value}, ' ', ''),'%') or r.rsv_mem_nm = #{value} or REPLACE(r.rsv_mem_pn, '-', '') LIKE CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{value}, '-', ''),'%')) and r.rsv_repeat_period = 'N' and (r.rsv_confirm_state = 'Y' or r.rsv_confirm_state = 'ACCEPT')

select * from ( select @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, A.* from ( select r.rsv_no, r.rsv_date, r.rsv_start_time, r.rsv_end_time, r.rsv_title, c.conf_nm, r.rsv_mem_nm, r.rsv_mem_pn
from RESERVATION r, CONFERENCE c
where r.rsv_conf_no = c.conf_no and REPLACE(r.rsv_title, ' ', '') like CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{value}, ' ', ''),'%') and r.rsv_repeat_period = 'N' and (r.rsv_confirm_state = 'Y' or r.rsv_confirm_state = 'ACCEPT')
order by r.rsv_date DESC) A, (select @RNUM := 0) B) C where C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPage} AND #{endPage}

select * from ( select @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, A.* from ( select r.rsv_no, r.rsv_date, r.rsv_start_time, r.rsv_end_time, r.rsv_title, c.conf_nm, r.rsv_mem_nm, r.rsv_mem_pn
from RESERVATION r, CONFERENCE c
where r.rsv_conf_no = c.conf_no and REPLACE(r.rsv_title, ' ', '') like CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{value}, ' ', ''),'%') and r.rsv_repeat_period = 'N' and (r.rsv_confirm_state = 'Y' or r.rsv_confirm_state = 'ACCEPT')
order by r.rsv_date ASC) A, (select @RNUM := 0) B) C where C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPage} AND #{endPage}

select count(*) from RESERVATION r
where REPLACE(r.rsv_title, ' ', '') like CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{value}, ' ', ''),'%') and r.rsv_repeat_period = 'N' and (r.rsv_confirm_state = 'Y' or r.rsv_confirm_state = 'ACCEPT')

select * from ( select @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, A.* from ( select r.rsv_no, r.rsv_date, r.rsv_start_time, r.rsv_end_time, r.rsv_title, c.conf_nm, r.rsv_mem_nm, r.rsv_mem_pn
from RESERVATION r, CONFERENCE c
where r.rsv_conf_no = c.conf_no and r.rsv_mem_nm = #{value} and r.rsv_repeat_period = 'N' and (r.rsv_confirm_state = 'Y' or r.rsv_confirm_state = 'ACCEPT')
order by r.rsv_date DESC) A, (select @RNUM := 0) B) C where C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPage} AND #{endPage}

select * from ( select @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, A.* from ( select r.rsv_no, r.rsv_date, r.rsv_start_time, r.rsv_end_time, r.rsv_title, c.conf_nm, r.rsv_mem_nm, r.rsv_mem_pn
from RESERVATION r, CONFERENCE c
where r.rsv_conf_no = c.conf_no and r.rsv_mem_nm = #{value} and r.rsv_repeat_period = 'N' and (r.rsv_confirm_state = 'Y' or r.rsv_confirm_state = 'ACCEPT')
order by r.rsv_date ASC) A, (select @RNUM := 0) B) C where C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPage} AND #{endPage}

select count(*) from RESERVATION r
where r.rsv_mem_nm = #{value} and r.rsv_repeat_period = 'N' and (r.rsv_confirm_state = 'Y' or r.rsv_confirm_state = 'ACCEPT')

select * from ( select @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, A.* from ( select r.rsv_no, r.rsv_date, r.rsv_start_time, r.rsv_end_time, r.rsv_title, c.conf_nm, r.rsv_mem_nm, r.rsv_mem_pn
from RESERVATION r, CONFERENCE c
where r.rsv_conf_no = c.conf_no and REPLACE(r.rsv_mem_pn, '-', '') LIKE CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{value}, '-', ''),'%') and r.rsv_repeat_period = 'N' and (r.rsv_confirm_state = 'Y' or r.rsv_confirm_state = 'ACCEPT')
order by r.rsv_date DESC) A, (select @RNUM := 0) B) C where C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPage} AND #{endPage}

select * from ( select @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, A.* from ( select r.rsv_no, r.rsv_date, r.rsv_start_time, r.rsv_end_time, r.rsv_title, c.conf_nm, r.rsv_mem_nm, r.rsv_mem_pn
from RESERVATION r, CONFERENCE c
where r.rsv_conf_no = c.conf_no and REPLACE(r.rsv_mem_pn, '-', '') LIKE CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{value}, '-', ''),'%') and r.rsv_repeat_period = 'N' and (r.rsv_confirm_state = 'Y' or r.rsv_confirm_state = 'ACCEPT')
order by r.rsv_date ASC) A, (select @RNUM := 0) B) C where C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPage} AND #{endPage}

select count(*) from RESERVATION r
where REPLACE(r.rsv_mem_pn, '-', '') LIKE CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{value}, '-', ''),'%') and r.rsv_repeat_period = 'N' and (r.rsv_confirm_state = 'Y' or r.rsv_confirm_state = 'ACCEPT')

select * from ( select @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, A.* from (
select * from ( select r.rsv_date, r.rsv_start_time, r.rsv_end_time, r.rsv_title, c.conf_nm, r.rsv_mem_nm, r.rsv_mem_pn, r.rsv_repeat_period, r.rsv_setting, r.rsv_repeat_no from RESERVATION r, CONFERENCE c
where r.rsv_conf_no = c.conf_no and (REPLACE(r.rsv_title, ' ', '') like CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{value}, '-', ''),'%') or r.rsv_mem_nm = #{value} or REPLACE(r.rsv_mem_pn, '-', '') LIKE CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{value}, '-', ''),'%')) and r.rsv_repeat_period != 'N' and r.rsv_confirm_state = 'ACCEPT'
group by r.rsv_repeat_no order by r.rsv_date ASC) CNT order by rsv_date DESC, rsv_start_time ASC, rsv_mem_nm ASC) A, (select @RNUM := 0) B) C where C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPage} and #{endPage}

select * from ( select @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, A.* from (
select * from ( select r.rsv_date, r.rsv_start_time, r.rsv_end_time, r.rsv_title, c.conf_nm, r.rsv_mem_nm, r.rsv_mem_pn, r.rsv_repeat_period, r.rsv_setting, r.rsv_repeat_no from RESERVATION r, CONFERENCE c
where r.rsv_conf_no = c.conf_no and (REPLACE(r.rsv_title, ' ', '') like CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{value}, '-', ''),'%') or r.rsv_mem_nm = #{value} or REPLACE(r.rsv_mem_pn, '-', '') LIKE CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{value}, '-', ''),'%')) and r.rsv_repeat_period != 'N' and r.rsv_confirm_state = 'ACCEPT'
group by r.rsv_repeat_no order by r.rsv_date ASC) CNT order by rsv_date ASC, rsv_start_time ASC, rsv_mem_nm ASC) A, (select @RNUM := 0) B) C where C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPage} and #{endPage}

select * from ( select @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, A.* from (
select * from ( select r.rsv_date, r.rsv_start_time, r.rsv_end_time, r.rsv_title, c.conf_nm, r.rsv_mem_nm, r.rsv_mem_pn, r.rsv_repeat_period, r.rsv_setting, r.rsv_repeat_no from RESERVATION r, CONFERENCE c
where r.rsv_conf_no = c.conf_no and REPLACE(r.rsv_title, ' ', '') like CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{value}, '-', ''),'%') and r.rsv_repeat_period != 'N' and r.rsv_confirm_state = 'ACCEPT'
group by r.rsv_repeat_no order by r.rsv_date ASC) CNT order by rsv_date DESC, rsv_start_time ASC, rsv_mem_nm ASC) A, (select @RNUM := 0) B) C where C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPage} and #{endPage}

select * from ( select @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, A.* from (
select * from ( select r.rsv_date, r.rsv_start_time, r.rsv_end_time, r.rsv_title, c.conf_nm, r.rsv_mem_nm, r.rsv_mem_pn, r.rsv_repeat_period, r.rsv_setting, r.rsv_repeat_no from RESERVATION r, CONFERENCE c
where r.rsv_conf_no = c.conf_no and REPLACE(r.rsv_title, ' ', '') like CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{value}, '-', ''),'%') and r.rsv_repeat_period != 'N' and r.rsv_confirm_state = 'ACCEPT'
group by r.rsv_repeat_no order by r.rsv_date ASC) CNT order by rsv_date ASC, rsv_start_time ASC, rsv_mem_nm ASC) A, (select @RNUM := 0) B) C where C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPage} and #{endPage}

select * from ( select @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, A.* from (
select * from ( select r.rsv_date, r.rsv_start_time, r.rsv_end_time, r.rsv_title, c.conf_nm, r.rsv_mem_nm, r.rsv_mem_pn, r.rsv_repeat_period, r.rsv_setting, r.rsv_repeat_no from RESERVATION r, CONFERENCE c
where r.rsv_conf_no = c.conf_no and r.rsv_mem_nm = #{value} and r.rsv_repeat_period != 'N' and r.rsv_confirm_state = 'ACCEPT'
group by r.rsv_repeat_no order by r.rsv_date ASC) CNT order by rsv_date DESC, rsv_start_time ASC, rsv_mem_nm ASC) A, (select @RNUM := 0) B) C where C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPage} and #{endPage}

select * from ( select @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, A.* from (
select * from ( select r.rsv_date, r.rsv_start_time, r.rsv_end_time, r.rsv_title, c.conf_nm, r.rsv_mem_nm, r.rsv_mem_pn, r.rsv_repeat_period, r.rsv_setting, r.rsv_repeat_no from RESERVATION r, CONFERENCE c
where r.rsv_conf_no = c.conf_no and r.rsv_mem_nm = #{value} and r.rsv_repeat_period != 'N' and r.rsv_confirm_state = 'ACCEPT'
group by r.rsv_repeat_no order by r.rsv_date ASC) CNT order by rsv_date ASC, rsv_start_time ASC, rsv_mem_nm ASC) A, (select @RNUM := 0) B) C where C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPage} and #{endPage}

select * from ( select @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, A.* from (
select * from ( select r.rsv_date, r.rsv_start_time, r.rsv_end_time, r.rsv_title, c.conf_nm, r.rsv_mem_nm, r.rsv_mem_pn, r.rsv_repeat_period, r.rsv_setting, r.rsv_repeat_no from RESERVATION r, CONFERENCE c
where r.rsv_conf_no = c.conf_no and REPLACE(r.rsv_mem_pn, '-', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{value}, '-', ''),'%') and r.rsv_repeat_period != 'N' and r.rsv_confirm_state = 'ACCEPT'
group by r.rsv_repeat_no order by r.rsv_date ASC) CNT order by rsv_date DESC, rsv_start_time ASC, rsv_mem_nm ASC) A, (select @RNUM := 0) B) C where C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPage} and #{endPage}

select * from ( select @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, A.* from (
select * from ( select r.rsv_date, r.rsv_start_time, r.rsv_end_time, r.rsv_title, c.conf_nm, r.rsv_mem_nm, r.rsv_mem_pn, r.rsv_repeat_period, r.rsv_setting, r.rsv_repeat_no from RESERVATION r, CONFERENCE c
where r.rsv_conf_no = c.conf_no and REPLACE(r.rsv_mem_pn, '-', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{value}, '-', ''),'%') and r.rsv_repeat_period != 'N' and r.rsv_confirm_state = 'ACCEPT'
group by r.rsv_repeat_no order by r.rsv_date ASC) CNT order by rsv_date ASC, rsv_start_time ASC, rsv_mem_nm ASC) A, (select @RNUM := 0) B) C where C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPage} and #{endPage}

select count(*) from ( select count(*) from RESERVATION r
where (REPLACE(r.rsv_title, ' ', '') like CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{value}, '-', ''),'%') or r.rsv_mem_nm = #{value} or REPLACE(r.rsv_mem_pn, '-', '') LIKE CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{value}, '-', ''),'%')) and r.rsv_repeat_period != 'N' and r.rsv_confirm_state = 'ACCEPT'
group by r.rsv_repeat_no) CNT

select count(*) from ( select count(*) from RESERVATION r
where REPLACE(r.rsv_title, ' ', '') like CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{value}, ' ', ''),'%') and r.rsv_repeat_period != 'N' and r.rsv_confirm_state = 'ACCEPT'
group by r.rsv_repeat_no) CNT

select count(*) from ( select count(*) from RESERVATION r
where r.rsv_mem_nm = #{value} and r.rsv_repeat_period != 'N' and r.rsv_confirm_state = 'ACCEPT'
group by r.rsv_repeat_no) CNT

select count(*) from ( select count(*) from RESERVATION r
where REPLACE(r.rsv_mem_pn, '-', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{value}, '-', ''),'%') and r.rsv_repeat_period != 'N' and r.rsv_confirm_state = 'ACCEPT'
group by r.rsv_repeat_no) CNT

select r.rsv_no, r.rsv_date, r.rsv_start_time, r.rsv_end_time, r.rsv_title, r.rsv_mem_nm, r.rsv_mem_pn, r.rsv_confirm_state, r.rsv_repeat_period, r.rsv_setting, r.rsv_repeat_no, c.conf_nm from RESERVATION r, CONFERENCE c
where r.rsv_conf_no = c.conf_no and r.rsv_repeat_no = #{repeatSeq}

SELECT DISTINCT RSV_TITLE FROM RESERVATION
WHERE REPLACE(RSV_TITLE, ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{value}, ' ', ''),'%')
UNION SELECT DISTINCT RSV_MEM_NM FROM RESERVATION
WHERE RSV_MEM_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{value},'%')
UNION SELECT DISTINCT RSV_MEM_PN FROM RESERVATION
WHERE REPLACE(RSV_MEM_PN, '-', '') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{value},'%')

SELECT DISTINCT RSV_TITLE FROM RESERVATION
WHERE REPLACE(RSV_TITLE, ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{value}, ' ', ''),'%')

SELECT DISTINCT RSV_MEM_NM FROM RESERVATION
WHERE RSV_MEM_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{value},'%')

SELECT DISTINCT RSV_MEM_PN FROM RESERVATION
WHERE REPLACE(RSV_MEM_PN, '-', '') LIKE CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{value}, '-', ''),'%')

SELECT DISTINCT RSV_MEM_PN FROM RESERVATION
WHERE REPLACE(RSV_MEM_PN, '-', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{value}, '-', ''),'%')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM +1 AS ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT H.HST_DATE, H.HST_START_TIME, H.HST_END_TIME, C.CONF_NM, H.HST_RSV_TITLE, H.HST_RSV_MEM_NM, H.HST_RSV_MEM_PN, H.HST_REPEAT_PERIOD, H.HST_SETTING, H.HST_RSV_STATE, H.HST_REG_DATE FROM HISTORY H, CONFERENCE C
WHERE H.HST_CONF_NO = C.CONF_NO AND H.HST_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND H.HST_RSV_STATE != 'NOSHOW' AND H.HST_REPEAT_PERIOD = 'N' ORDER BY H.HST_DATE DESC, H.HST_START_TIME ASC, H.HST_NO DESC ) A, (SELECT @RNUM := 0) B) C WHERE C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPage} AND #{endPage}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM +1 AS ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT H.HST_DATE, H.HST_START_TIME, H.HST_END_TIME, C.CONF_NM, H.HST_RSV_TITLE, H.HST_RSV_MEM_NM, H.HST_RSV_MEM_PN, H.HST_REPEAT_PERIOD, H.HST_SETTING, H.HST_RSV_STATE, H.HST_REG_DATE FROM HISTORY H, CONFERENCE C
WHERE H.HST_CONF_NO = C.CONF_NO AND H.HST_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND H.HST_RSV_STATE != 'NOSHOW' AND H.HST_REPEAT_PERIOD = 'N' ORDER BY H.HST_DATE ASC, H.HST_START_TIME ASC, H.HST_NO DESC ) A, (SELECT @RNUM := 0) B) C WHERE C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPage} AND #{endPage}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM +1 AS ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT H.HST_DATE, H.HST_START_TIME, H.HST_END_TIME, C.CONF_NM, H.HST_RSV_TITLE, H.HST_RSV_MEM_NM, H.HST_RSV_MEM_PN, H.HST_REPEAT_PERIOD, H.HST_SETTING, H.HST_RSV_STATE, H.HST_REG_DATE FROM HISTORY H, CONFERENCE C
WHERE H.HST_CONF_NO = C.CONF_NO AND H.HST_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND H.HST_RSV_STATE != 'NOSHOW' AND H.HST_REPEAT_PERIOD = 'N' ORDER BY H.HST_RSV_MEM_NM ASC, H.HST_DATE ASC, H.HST_NO DESC ) A, (SELECT @RNUM := 0) B) C WHERE C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPage} AND #{endPage}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HISTORY H
WHERE H.HST_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND H.HST_RSV_STATE != 'NOSHOW' AND H.HST_REPEAT_PERIOD = 'N'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM +1 AS ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MIN(H.HST_DATE) X, MAX(H.HST_DATE) Y, H.HST_START_TIME, H.HST_END_TIME, C.CONF_NM, H.HST_RSV_TITLE, H.HST_RSV_MEM_NM, H.HST_RSV_MEM_PN, H.HST_REPEAT_PERIOD, H.HST_SETTING, H.HST_RSV_STATE, H.HST_REG_DATE, H.HST_REPEAT_NO
FROM HISTORY H, CONFERENCE C WHERE H.HST_CONF_NO = C.CONF_NO AND H.HST_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND H.HST_RSV_STATE != 'NOSHOW' AND H.HST_REPEAT_PERIOD != 'N' GROUP BY HST_REPEAT_NO ORDER BY H.HST_DATE DESC, H.HST_START_TIME ASC, H.HST_NO DESC ) A, (SELECT @RNUM := 0) B) C WHERE C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPage} AND #{endPage}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM +1 AS ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MIN(H.HST_DATE) X, MAX(H.HST_DATE) Y, H.HST_START_TIME, H.HST_END_TIME, C.CONF_NM, H.HST_RSV_TITLE, H.HST_RSV_MEM_NM, H.HST_RSV_MEM_PN, H.HST_REPEAT_PERIOD, H.HST_SETTING, H.HST_RSV_STATE, H.HST_REG_DATE, H.HST_REPEAT_NO
FROM HISTORY H, CONFERENCE C WHERE H.HST_CONF_NO = C.CONF_NO AND H.HST_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND H.HST_RSV_STATE != 'NOSHOW' AND H.HST_REPEAT_PERIOD != 'N' GROUP BY HST_REPEAT_NO ORDER BY H.HST_DATE ASC, H.HST_START_TIME ASC, H.HST_NO DESC ) A, (SELECT @RNUM := 0) B) C WHERE C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPage} AND #{endPage}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM +1 AS ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MIN(H.HST_DATE) X, MAX(H.HST_DATE) Y, H.HST_START_TIME, H.HST_END_TIME, C.CONF_NM, H.HST_RSV_TITLE, H.HST_RSV_MEM_NM, H.HST_RSV_MEM_PN, H.HST_REPEAT_PERIOD, H.HST_SETTING, H.HST_RSV_STATE, H.HST_REG_DATE, H.HST_REPEAT_NO
FROM HISTORY H, CONFERENCE C WHERE H.HST_CONF_NO = C.CONF_NO AND H.HST_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND H.HST_RSV_STATE != 'NOSHOW' AND H.HST_REPEAT_PERIOD != 'N' GROUP BY HST_REPEAT_NO ORDER BY H.HST_RSV_MEM_NM ASC, H.HST_DATE ASC, H.HST_NO DESC ) A, (SELECT @RNUM := 0) B) C WHERE C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPage} AND #{endPage}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HISTORY H
WHERE H.HST_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND H.HST_RSV_STATE != 'NOSHOW' AND H.HST_REPEAT_PERIOD != 'N' GROUP BY HST_REPEAT_NO ) CNT

SELECT H.HST_DATE, H.HST_START_TIME, H.HST_END_TIME, C.CONF_NM, H.HST_RSV_TITLE, H.HST_RSV_MEM_NM, H.HST_RSV_MEM_PN, H.HST_REPEAT_PERIOD, H.HST_SETTING, H.HST_RSV_STATE, H.HST_REG_DATE, H.HST_REPEAT_NO FROM HISTORY H, CONFERENCE C WHERE H.HST_CONF_NO = C.CONF_NO AND H.HST_REPEAT_NO = #{repeatSeq}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM +1 AS ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT H.HST_DATE, H.HST_START_TIME, H.HST_END_TIME, C.CONF_NM, H.HST_RSV_TITLE, H.HST_RSV_MEM_NM, H.HST_RSV_MEM_PN, H.HST_REPEAT_PERIOD, H.HST_SETTING, H.HST_RSV_STATE, H.HST_REG_DATE FROM HISTORY H, CONFERENCE C
WHERE H.HST_CONF_NO = C.CONF_NO AND H.HST_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND H.HST_RSV_STATE = 'NOSHOW' ORDER BY H.HST_DATE DESC, H.HST_START_TIME ASC, H.HST_NO DESC ) A, (SELECT @RNUM := 0) B) C WHERE C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPage} AND #{endPage}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM +1 AS ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT H.HST_DATE, H.HST_START_TIME, H.HST_END_TIME, C.CONF_NM, H.HST_RSV_TITLE, H.HST_RSV_MEM_NM, H.HST_RSV_MEM_PN, H.HST_REPEAT_PERIOD, H.HST_SETTING, H.HST_RSV_STATE, H.HST_REG_DATE FROM HISTORY H, CONFERENCE C
WHERE H.HST_CONF_NO = C.CONF_NO AND H.HST_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND H.HST_RSV_STATE = 'NOSHOW' ORDER BY H.HST_DATE ASC, H.HST_START_TIME ASC, H.HST_NO DESC ) A, (SELECT @RNUM := 0) B) C WHERE C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPage} AND #{endPage}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HISTORY H
WHERE H.HST_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND H.HST_RSV_STATE = 'NOSHOW'
